title: Chernobyl
review: A harrowing, meticulously crafted look at one of history's greatest man-made disasters. The tension is palpable from the first frame to the last. The scientific detail merged with human tragedy makes it a perfect 5/5.

title: Marty Supreme
review: Absolutely electric. A stylized, high-energy character study that captures a unique rhythm. The Safdie-produced energy is real. Easily one of the most vital watches of the year.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
review: Visually unparalleled and a total immersion into Pandora. While the world-building is unmatched, it definitely feels like a bit of a slow read/watch in the middle act, which holds it back from a perfect score.
